t: Amazon Sponsored Display Ads: All You Need to Know in 2024
s: February 2, 2024 - Formerly known as Product targeting, Amazon Sponsored Display Contextual advertising allows you to reach out to users actively browsing products similar to yours based on predefined characteristics. These characteristics include category, price, brand, star rating, and Prime shipping eligibility.
